articles.title: Karisma Kapoor stuns in a luxurious brown silk saree with gold floral embroidery - The Times of India
articles.description: Karisma Kapoor stole the spotlight at Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding bash.
articles.content: For her glam makeup, Karisma opted for a matte base, mascara-laden lashes, smudged brown eyeliner, blushed cheeks and a shade of matte brown lipstick.
